welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sidney, a charming city known for its beautiful scenery and friendly locals. Get ready to explore and experience all that this vibrant city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Neil Armstrong Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Neil Armstrong Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dayton-Wright Brothers Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail stores, and rental car services.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at James Cox Dayton International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at James Cox Dayton International Airport serves American Airlines and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at James Cox Dayton International Airport serves Delta Air Lines and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
